Key Match Events: Brooks Lee had a five-RBI day, including a two-run, go-ahead single in the sixth inning and a three-run, bases-clearing triple in the seventh.
Post-Match Reflections: Brooks Lee expressed hope that his performance would translate to the playoffs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins' win helped them maintain a 2 1/2 game lead for the final AL Wild Card slot and a 6 1/2 game deficit behind the division-leading Guardians.
Others: The Twins played without their two best hitters in the lineup due to injury.
